TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi sealed ToolbarPlacement extends System.Enum

Docs.summary: Enumerates toolbar positions for pages on the Windows platform.

MemberSignature.Value: .field public static literal valuetype Xamarin.Forms.PlatformConfiguration.WindowsSpecific.ToolbarPlacement Bottom = int32(2)

Docs.summary: Indicates that the toolbar should be placed at the bottom of the screen.

MemberSignature.Value: .field public static literal valuetype Xamarin.Forms.PlatformConfiguration.WindowsSpecific.ToolbarPlacement Default = int32(0)

Docs.summary: Indicates that the toolbar should be placed at the system default location on the screen.

MemberSignature.Value: .field public static literal valuetype Xamarin.Forms.PlatformConfiguration.WindowsSpecific.ToolbarPlacement Top = int32(1)
